content: a lovely pattern that doesn t look as boxy as some baby cardigans can **materials ** * 2 skeins 3801 aqua ice a * 2 skeins 3101 ivory b * four buttons 5/8 in diameter * pompom maker * stitch markers * yarn needle also at knitting daily 1 appeared on episode 412 1 https //www interweave com/article/crochet/newborn-layette-from-knitting-daily-tv-episode-412-2/ cid=search
